full_description:
Lenovo ThinkCentre neo 50t Core i3 12th Gen Tower Business Brand PC

The Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50t Business PC has an Intel 12th Gen Intel Core i3-12100 (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz to 4.30 GHz). The features of this tower workstation include Intel UHD Graphics 770, 1x HDMI 1.4b, 1x DisplayPort 1.4, Chipset Intel B660, 4GB UDIMM DDR4-3200MHz, 2 DDR4 UDIMM slots, and 1TB 7200rpm HDD 3.5" SATA. The USB Calliope Mouse and Black - English (US) Calliope are included with this Tower Workstation. One PCIe 4.0 x16, full-height, half-length is present here. Two full-height, half-length PCIe 3.0 x1 cards. M.2 slots in two (one for WLAN, one for SSD). Additionally, this workstation features RealTek Wireless RTL8822CE, Intel I219-LM, and 1x GbE RJ-45. 1 USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (supports data transmission and 5V@3A charging), 1 headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 2x2 AC, and Bluetooth 5.0 (3.5mm).

Increases Productivity and Is Secure by Design

The Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50t Gen 3 Tower has High performance and minimal carbon footprint, thanks to 12th Gen Intel Core CPUs. Regardless of whether you're processing huge datasets or simply working on graphics-intensive tasks, these CPUs offer the computing power you require. Innovative ThinkShield security solutions, a group of hardware and software that work together to defend your device and your data, are used to protect the ThinkCentre Neo 50t tower. You may choose from a variety of physical security options, a self-healing BIOS with BIOS Guard and Boot Guard, a discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) 2.0 that encrypts your credentials, and smart USB protection.

Remote, Efficient Cooperation

Select the optional WiFi option if you want to collaborate quickly, simply, and easily without worrying about a LAN wire. It only has to be turned on and connected to the network. The ability to quickly connect two computing devices and use them concurrently on one screen has been easier with the addition of an optional Smart Cable, elevating device collaboration to a new level. With the available Smart Cable Clip, your desk will also be free of clutter and cables. The Lenovo ThinkCentre neo 50t Tower Business PC comes with a 03-year standard warranty.

The Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s SFF is a small-form-factor PC that prioritizes performance and security. It is powered by an Intel Core i5-12400 12th Generation processor, which has a base clock of 2.5GHz (up to 4.4GHz) and 12 threads in addition to six cores and eight gigabytes of DDR4 RAM that can be expanded to 64GB. Smooth visuals are guaranteed by the integrated Intel UHD Graphics 770, while quick and large storage is offered by the 1TB SSD. With a Discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) 2.0 and several BIOS security features like a power-on password, supervisor password, and hard disk password, the Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s SFF Brand PC prioritizes security. Performance is guaranteed by the 260W power supply. There are two USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports on the front, USB-C 3.2 Gen 1, and audio jacks; on the back, there are USB 2.0, USB 3.2 Gen 1, HDMI 2.1, DisplayPort 1.4, VGA, Ethernet, and line-out connectors. A second serial port, parallel, serial, and card reader are among the optional ports. With its small size of 100 x 308 x 274.8 mm and weight of about 4.5 kg, the Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s SFF is a space-efficient device. This PC, which runs FreeDOS, gives users the freedom to select their favorite operating system.

full_description:
Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s Gen 3 SFF Core i5 12th Gen Brand PC

The Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s Gen 3 SFF is a small-form-factor PC that prioritizes performance and security. It is powered by an Intel Core i5-12500 12th Generation processor, which has a base clock of 3.00GHz (up to 4.60GHz) and 12 threads in addition to six cores and 8GB of DDR4 RAM that can be expanded to 64GB. Smooth visuals are guaranteed by the integrated Intel UHD Graphics 770, while quick and large storage is offered by the 1TB HDD. With a Discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) 2.0 and several BIOS security features like a power-on password, supervisor password, and hard disk password, the Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s Gen 3 SFF Brand PC prioritizes security. Performance is guaranteed by the 180W power supply. There are two USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports on the front, USB-C 3.2 Gen 1, and audio jacks; on the back, there are USB 2.0, USB 3.2 Gen 1, HDMI 2.1, DisplayPort 1.4, VGA, Ethernet, and line-out connectors. A second serial port, parallel, serial, and card reader are among the optional ports. With its small size of 100 x 308 x 274.8 mm and weight of about 4.5 kg, the Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s Gen 3 SFF is a space-efficient device. This PC, which runs FreeDOS, gives users the freedom to select their favorite operating system.

Buy Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo 50s Gen 3 SFF Core i5 12th Gen Brand PC From Star Tech
